General.Name: Central Hydropower JSC
General.Description: Central Hydropower Joint Stock Company produces, transmits, and distributes electricity in Vietnam. The company constructs and operates a hydropower plant with a capacity of 170 MW in the A Luoi District of Thua Thien Hue province. It also engages in provision of management consultancy activities; construction and installation of irrigation works, hydro, cable works, electrical substation, and construction traffic works; dredging of the lakes; architectural, engineering, and technical consultancy related services; exploitation of stone, sand, gravel, and clay; marine aquaculture; real estate business; short-stay services; restaurant and catering services; travel business; and entertainment activities. Central Hydropower Joint Stock Company was incorporated 2004 and is headquartered in Da Nang, Vietnam.
